original_title: The Long Count II (Rumble In The Jungle)
overview: The Long Count (Rumble In The Jungle), is the second of three works in which the artist has painstakingly removed Muhammad Ali from the boxerâ€™s most famous bouts. This piece continues his investigation of racial identity through his use of popular iconography, namely athletes and movie stars, across various media.
title: The Long Count II (Rumble In The Jungle)
